verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> thee a <S%H430>god<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> that he <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of his <S%H4480>land.<s%> <S%H776><s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H7185>harden<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H226>signs<s%> and my <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, that I may <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H6635>armies,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments.<s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> when they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>Show<s%> a <S%H4159>miracle<s%> for you: then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> cast <S%H7993>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the wise <S%H2450>men<s%> and the <S%H3784>sorcerers:<s%> now the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> in like <S%H3651>manner<s%> with their <S%H3858>enchantments.<s%>

For they cast <S%H7993>down<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H8577>serpents:<s%> but <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4294>rods.<s%>

And he <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3515>hardened,<s%> he <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Get <S%H1980><s%> thee <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> he goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H4325>water;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H2975>river's<s%> <S%H8193>brink<s%> against he <S%H7125>come;<s%> and the <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H853>Let<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H5704>hitherto<s%> <S%H3541><s%> thou wouldest <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> In <S%H2063>this<s%> thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and they shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> and the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H887>stink;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3811>loathe<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2975>river.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> thy <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H5104>streams,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H98>ponds,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4723>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and that there may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both in vessels of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and in vessels of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded;<s%> and he lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H2975>river,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H2975>river<s%> were <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H887>stank,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2975>river;<s%> and there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> with their <S%H3909>enchantments:<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did he <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did he <S%H7896>set<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H2975>river<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4480>water<s%> <S%H4325><s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>
And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2975>river.<s%>
